sql.statement: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS pos_help ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL UNIQUE, language VARCHAR(2), Header TEXT, HeaderTrans TEXT, Description TEXT )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS pos_systeem ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL UNIQUE, _mainid INTEGER DEFAULT 0, systeemkey INTEGER DEFAULT 0, systeemvalue VARCHAR(100), description VARCHAR(100), seqno INTEGER DEFAULT 0, inputtype INTEGER DEFAULT 0, recordtype INTEGER DEFAULT 0)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS pos_category ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL UNIQUE, _mainid INTEGER DEFAULT 0, seqno INTEGER DEFAULT 0, type INTEGER DEFAULT 0, level INTEGER DEFAULT 0, title VARCHAR(50), description VARCHAR(500))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS pos_product ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL UNIQUE, _categoryid INTEGER, type INTEGER DEFAULT 0, title VARCHAR(50), description VARCHAR(500), price NUMERIC(6,2), code VARCHAR(50), blocked INTEGER, dateavailable DATE, filelastmodified DATE, recursive INTEGER, dirname VARCHAR(200), filename VARCHAR(50), rotation INTEGER, gpslocation VARCHAR(500), gpsstatus INTEGER, sizekb INTEGER DEFAULT 0)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS pos_product_rel ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, _productid INTEGER NOT NULL, _categoryid INTEGER NOT NULL )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS pos_order ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL UNIQUE, buyername VARCHAR(200), address VARCHAR(200), email VARCHAR(200), discount NUMERIC(6,2), orderdate DATE, deliverdate DATE, description VARCHAR(200) )
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS pos_orderline ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL UNIQUE, _orderid INTEGER NOT NULL, _productid INTEGER NOT NULL, amount INTEGER )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS pos_face ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, _productid INTEGER NOT NULL, _categoryid INTEGER NOT NULL, seqno INTEGER DEFAULT 0, spoof INTEGER DEFAULT 0, distance NUMERIC(6,2), extra VARCHAR(10000))
